reuters.title: <NATIONAL FRANCHISORS INC> TO LAUNCH FRANCHISE
reuters.body: National Franchisors Inc, a franchise development and consulting business, said it will launch its first project, the Shoesmith shoe-care and repair shop. The company said it is negotiating for several shopping center locations for initial franchise sites and that it will soon open a pilot Shoesmith shop and training center. It also said it signed an agreement with <Sutton-Landis Shoe Machinery Co>, St. Louis, to supply the franchises with machinery and support services. Reuter 
